SELECT PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NM, PROJECT_DEPT_NAME, PROJECT_BGNDE, PROJECT_ENDDE, PROJECT_PER, PROJECT_CN FROM PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} LIMIT 1
